nodes.title:
Yes speculation is running rampant right now

But the S&P 500 is up like 2% this year

It's up 19% over the last year

43% over 3 years

The 1999 comps are lazy

This is something different and...weirder

nodes.title:
If you're a hedge fund that's short Gamestop you really only  have 2 options:

1. Close your fund to "spend more time w/your family"*

2. Write an 87 page quarterly letter blaming the Fed

*open up a new fund in 18 months under a new name

but sometimes you have to step back to appreciate how insane the stock market can be

it's a laboratory for human nature on steroids https://t.co/KjAgKaz7Fs
